This was an amazing find!  Recommended by our hotel's concierge, we'd highly recommend this charming restaurant ourselves!  We actually went for drinks one night and tapas the next.  Probably one of our favorite meals in Barcelona.  The jamon wrapped croquets were amazing.  We also loved the eggplant dish.  Our favorite however was the potatoes drizzled with a cream and red sauce (much like a spicy romesco).  We talked about how delicous the potatoes were the rest of our trip.  I highly recommend reservations.  Enjoy!
